scripts.init-dev: npm install && cd front && npm install && set REACT_APP_API_URL=http://localhost:8000 && npm run build
scripts.build-dev: cd front && set REACT_APP_API_URL=http://localhost:8000 && npm run build
scripts.start-react: cd front && set REACT_APP_API_URL 'http://localhost:8000' && npm start
scripts.build-production: npm install && cd front && npm install && set REACT_APP_API_URL='https://chat-odn3.onrender.com' && npm run build
